commit message: Load a game's collection after the game's main info to ensure the game name is populated.
Fix bug where the collection name wouldn't appear if the published year was the same as the game's published year
If we don't have a swatch for icon tinting, default to black
Consider an exception thrown while executing a SyncTask to be 'worth' 10 IoExceptions in an attempt to make the service try less frequently.
Avoid NPE when adding a color.
prevent 2 decimals from being entered in the number pad
Log the date being parsed to attempt to catch unknown date format.
Check to see if the CollectionFragment is still attached before processing a multi-selection change
Test buddy for an empty username before trying to save it.
Perform a background sync only every 24 hours.
Only attempt to perform a 20 consecutive game fetches.
Set initial retry wait time to 1s and limit it to 5 retries.
Disable the game sync retry logic triggered by a timeout, and only sync 10 games at a time
Vary the number of retries by response code (201 can retry more, 503 less)
Retrofit errors and socket timeouts should end the sync request immediately; don't attempt any other tasks.
